summary: Clean, pragmatic retry implementation. Only 2 minor issues: unreachable error path (4 lines) and potentially speculative timeout parameter.

issues.title: Unreachable RuntimeError fallback path
issues.why: Lines 142-145 contain error handling that can never be reached. All loop exit paths either return success or raise an exception earlier.

issues.title: Timeout parameter has no current usage
issues.why: The timeout parameter was added but no code uses it. Appears speculative until a real use case emerges.
issues.fix: Consider removing timeout parameter from __init__. Keep DEFAULT_TIMEOUT constant and self.timeout for testability, but don't expose configuration without a real need.
issues.verify: Check if there's a documented plan to customize timeouts. If not, remove parameter.
